org.transitime.db.structs

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Route
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    For storing in db information for a route. Based on GTFS information from routes.txt and other files.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRoutes

        public static java.util.List<Route> getRoutes(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                              int configRev)
                                       throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        Returns List of Route objects for the specified database revision. Orders them based on the GTFS route_order extension or the route short name if route_order not set.
        Parameters:
        session -
        configRev -
        Returns:
        Map of routes keyed on routeId
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • getLongestTripPatternForDirection

        public TripPattern getLongestTripPatternForDirection(java.lang.String directionId)
        Returns longest trip pattern for the directionId specified. Note: gets trip patterns from Core, which means it works in the core application, not just when processing GTFS data.
        Parameters:
        directionId -
        Returns:

      • getLongestTripPatternForEachDirection

        public java.util.List<TripPattern> getLongestTripPatternForEachDirection()
        Returns the longest trip pattern for each direction ID for the route. Will typically be two trip patterns since there are usually two directions per route.
        Returns:

      • getOrderedStopsByDirection

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getOrderedStopsByDirection()
        For each GTFS direction ID returns list of stops that in the appropriate order for the direction. The appropriate order means that when there are different trip patterns that the stops that are different will be inserted appropriately into the list
        Returns:
        Map keyed by direction ID and value of List of ordered stop IDs.

      • getShortName

        public java.lang.String getShortName()
        The short name is either specified by route_short_name in the routes.txt GTFS file or if that is null it will be the long name name.
        Returns:
        the short name for the route

      • getMaxAllowableDistanceFromSegment

        public double getMaxAllowableDistanceFromSegment()
        For specifying on a per route basis how far AVL report can be from segment and still have it be considered a match.

        the max distance if set, otherwise NaN
